constituent: shove, finger, fingers, elbow, dart, drop, heavens
koohiiStory1: In the busy pub, one of the dart players shoved his dart into my elbow by accident when it nearly slipped out of his fingers.
koohiiStory2: Your fingers slip when someone´s elbow shoves you, causing you to drop the dart you were about to throw. But as you can see, their elbow is very small, so you decide they´re too weak to shove back.
